channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Agent (MA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Agent (MA)

item.title: CVE-2020-7253|2024-08-04T09:25:48.643Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20agent%20%28ma%29
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in masvc.exe in McAfee Agent (MA) prior to 5.6.4 allows local users with administrator privileges to disable self-protection via a McAfee supplied command-line utility.
